column1: Table 1-47:  U.S.-Canadian Border Land-Passenger Gateways: Entering the United States
a Gateway is a pedestrian/ferry combination crossing.
Data reflect all personal vehicles, buses, passengers and pedestrians entering the United States across the U.S.-Canadian border, regardless of nationality.
U.S. Department of Transportation, Bureau of Transportation Statistics, Border Crossing/Entry Data, available at http://www.bts.gov/programs/international/ as of July 15, 2016.
